body:
A graph-based (node-based) visual scripting language can also be used for AI behaviours, and can double as a hacking/mind trick mini game. Make these scripts an in-game item to trade & share.

Similarly, force sight could double as a debug view once unlocked and enabled, or there could be an AR overlay to acquire. To inspect psychical objects, entities, targets etc.

comments.body: For the node-based editor, consider animating the edges as recommended by Nifflas: https://twitter.com/Nifflas/status/1586056640834416641

milestone.title: Tools
milestone.description: Make the game easier to mod.

title: Hacking / Mind Trick = visual scripting = AI programming
